question: Which district of Madhya Pradesh is said to be the birth place of CRPF (Central Reserve Police Forces)?
explanation: CRPF came into existence as the Crown Representativeâ€™s Police on 27 July 1939 to maintain Law and Order and counter-insurgency duties. After Indian Independence, it became the Central Reserve Police Force on enactment of the CRPF Act on 28 December 1949.
